faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about FlexiPI

general.title: General
general.a1: FlexiPI is an advanced supplier order management system designed for online store owners who source products from suppliers abroad.
general.a2: Simply sign up for a free account, set up your suppliers, and start managing your orders with ease.
general.q3: Is it right for my business?
general.a3: If you run an online store and work with suppliers abroad, FlexiPI can save you significant time and money in order management.

features.title: Features
features.q1: What features are included in the basic package?
features.a1: The basic package includes order management, shipment tracking, automated notifications, and basic reporting.
features.q2: Can it integrate with other systems?
features.a2: Yes, FlexiPI offers integrations with leading platforms like Shopify, WooCommerce, and more.
features.a3: Yes, the system includes advanced inventory management with low stock alerts and demand forecasting.

technical.title: Technical
technical.a1: We perform daily automatic backups and store data across multiple secure servers.
technical.q2: Does it work in all browsers?
technical.a2: Yes, FlexiPI supports all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.
technical.a3: All you need is an internet connection and a modern browser. No additional software installation required.

support.title: Support
support.a1: We offer live chat, email, and phone support during business hours.
support.q2: Is there training for new users?
support.a2: Yes, we provide detailed guides, video tutorials, and weekly webinars.
support.q3: What are the support response times?
support.a3: We commit to a 1-hour response time during business hours and 24 hours outside business hours.
